code: public Producer createProducer() throws Exception {     if (configuration.getOperation() == BonitaOperation.startCase) {         return new BonitaStartProducer(this, configuration).     } else {         throw new BonitaException("Operation specified is not supported.").     } }
public Consumer createConsumer(Processor processor) throws Exception {     throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Consumer not supported"). }
